channel.title: Services configuration object on Redis Documentation Center
channel.description: Recent content in Services configuration object on Redis Documentation Center

item.title: CM server object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description operating_mode ‘disabled’ ‘enabled’ Enable/disable the CM server

item.title: CRDB coordinator object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description operating_mode ‘disabled’ ‘enabled’ Enable/disable the CRDB coordinator process

item.title: CRDB worker object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description operating_mode ‘disabled’ ‘enabled’ Enable/disable the CRDB worker processes

item.title: MDNS server object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description operating_mode ‘disabled’ ‘enabled’ Enable/disable the multicast DNS server

item.title: PDNS server object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description operating_mode ‘disabled’ ‘enabled’ Enable/disable the PDNS server

item.title: saslauthd object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description operating_mode ‘disabled’ ‘enabled’ Enable/disable the saslauthd service

item.title: Stats archiver object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description operating_mode ‘disabled’ ‘enabled’ Enable/disable the stats archiver service
